heading: Ohiyac in ahkinsewowoye wine ke kuhfa luhn Leum uh ahkuhtweyucki. Sahp ke yac 401–421 Tukun Kraist.

verses.txt: Pa inge ohiyac in sang wine uh—Liye, elos eis kuhp uh, ac fahk:

O God, Pahpah Ma Pahtpaht, kuht siyuck Sum, ke inen Wen nuhtum, Jisus Kraist, in ahkinsewowoye ac ahkmuhtahlye wine se inge nuh sin mwet nuhkwewa suc nihm kac, tuh elos in kuh in oruh ma inge in esam srahn Wen nuhtum, ma tuh kahklah kaclos; tuh elos in kuh in ahkkahlwemye nuh Sum, O God, Pahpah Ma Pahtpaht, tuh elos in esamuhl pacl nuhkwewa, tuh Nguhn Lal in kuh in weluhlos. Amen.
